description.point: Developed a Battleship game in C with a GTK graphical interface, allowing play against AI or local multiplayer.
The player places ships and fires on the AI grid, which uses algorithms to effectively target ships.
In local multiplayer mode, ships are placed randomly to avoid giving away positions.
Developed a 2D train simulator where trains move along tracks on a board.
Implemented rules to prevent trains from leaving the board or using incompatible tiles.
Enabled users to add trains, edit the board in real time, and watch train behavior live.
Designed and developed a personal portfolio website to showcase projects and skills.
Implemented a responsive design to ensure optimal viewing on all devices.
Used JavaScript to create interactive features and enhance user experience.
Studied a combinatorial optimization problem to place logistics centers optimally in a country.
Applied concepts from linear and combinatorial optimization.
Modeled the problem with ILP and developed greedy and metaheuristic methods.
Compared methods by quality and computation time to recommend the best solution.
